name: 42 Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of a predictive analytics platform designed to provide businesses with clear insights on how to expand their operations. The company's platform considers multiple retail-specific metrics to leverage all business retail data from a top-level overview of the business to visual item reporting, drill-down analysis, and ad-hoc reporting, enabling retail businesses to reduce the time spent in making key performance indicators.
one_liner: Developer of a predictive analytics platform designed to provide businesses with clear insights on how to expand their operations. The company's platform considers multiple retail-specific metrics to leverage all business retail data from a top-level overview of the business to visual item reporting, drill-down analysis, and ad-hoc reporting, enabling retail businesses to reduce the time spent in making key performance indicators.

name: Simplemarket Inc.
description: Operator of a B2B marketplace intended to connect informal retailers directly with wholesalers and manufacturers. The company's platform helps small retailers source their inventory, and access financing, and essential insurance services, helping retailers to streamline their digital procurement and financing.
one_liner: Operator of a B2B marketplace intended to connect informal retailers directly with wholesalers and manufacturers. The company's platform helps small retailers source their inventory, and access financing, and essential insurance services, helping retailers to streamline their digital procurement and financing.
industry: CPG (Consumer packaged goods), Retail, B2B Marketplaces

name: Blackcart, Inc.
description: Developer of an e-commerce artificial intelligence (AI) platform designed to transform an online store into an at-home showroom. The company's platform offers customers to try on items from their favorite brands at home using AI tools without an upfront commitment, enabling businesses to increase sales by offering a try before you buy experience to their customers.
one_liner: Developer of an e-commerce artificial intelligence (AI) platform designed to transform an online store into an at-home showroom. The company's platform offers customers to try on items from their favorite brands at home using AI tools without an upfront commitment, enabling businesses to increase sales by offering a try before you buy experience to their customers.

name: BRICKS DAG, Inc.
description: Developer and operator of a digital platform designed for building interactive apps. With visual dynamic presentation technology and code-free software and hardware data concatenation, the company's low-code/no-code platform develops digital display contents suitable for billboards, kiosk, self-service machine and other screen application, enabling designers to improve content development efficiency and convenience.
one_liner: Developer and operator of a digital platform designed for building interactive apps. With visual dynamic presentation technology and code-free software and hardware data concatenation, the company's low-code/no-code platform develops digital display contents suitable for billboards, kiosk, self-service machine and other screen application, enabling designers to improve content development efficiency and convenience.

name: CurieVision, Inc.
description: Developer of a 3D product generation platform designed to offer 3D shopping assistance. The company's platform allows shoppers to discover the best reviews and product news at the point of a camera, enabling customers to instantly educate and consense information and make purchases.
one_liner: Developer of a 3D product generation platform designed to offer 3D shopping assistance. The company's platform allows shoppers to discover the best reviews and product news at the point of a camera, enabling customers to instantly educate and consense information and make purchases.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Ecommerce, Retail, VR/AR, Deep Tech, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Mobile, Commerce

name: Local Tech Holdings Limited
description: Developer of a group-buying social commerce application designed to reduce the cost of living for its customers and promote community connections. The platform facilitates users in purchasing products collectively, leading to cost savings while encouraging the sharing of deals among the community, focusing on affordable products presented in a fun and interactive manner, enabling the users to enjoy group buying and deal-sharing experiences, while offering free delivery services.
one_liner: Developer of a group-buying social commerce application designed to reduce the cost of living for its customers and promote community connections. The platform facilitates users in purchasing products collectively, leading to cost savings while encouraging the sharing of deals among the community, focusing on affordable products presented in a fun and interactive manner, enabling the users to enjoy group buying and deal-sharing experiences, while offering free delivery services.

name: PT Rekan Usaha Mikro Anda
description: Developer of a payment and lending networking platform designed to increase access and income for low-income communities through technology. The company's platform is focused on eliminating barriers to financial access for the masses and offers cell phone airtime and bill-pay services and helps create employment opportunities for the poor, enabling users to access products more easily, safely and comfortably.
one_liner: Developer of a payment and lending networking platform designed to increase access and income for low-income communities through technology. The company's platform is focused on eliminating barriers to financial access for the masses and offers cell phone airtime and bill-pay services and helps create employment opportunities for the poor, enabling users to access products more easily, safely and comfortably.

name: Meals In Minutes Sdn. Bhd.
description: Provider of ready-to-cook frozen meals intended to deliver food with convenience with the subscription. The company delivers portioned and prepped meals that are easy to prepare, comprising a variety of bases, sides, proteins, and even a burger, enabling starved individuals, mothers, and working couples to enjoy premium, halal, and healthy meals without spending much time on meal preparation.
one_liner: Provider of ready-to-cook frozen meals intended to deliver food with convenience with the subscription. The company delivers portioned and prepped meals that are easy to prepare, comprising a variety of bases, sides, proteins, and even a burger, enabling starved individuals, mothers, and working couples to enjoy premium, halal, and healthy meals without spending much time on meal preparation.

name: Melian Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a SaaS based point of sale designed to automate workflow. The company's platform helps in scheduling appointments, social bookings, growth marketing, staff, and listing management along with detailed analytics reports, enabling businesses to improve sales and productivity.
one_liner: Developer of a SaaS based point of sale designed to automate workflow. The company's platform helps in scheduling appointments, social bookings, growth marketing, staff, and listing management along with detailed analytics reports, enabling businesses to improve sales and productivity.

name: Omniful, Inc.
description: Developer of an operations platform designed for omnichannel retail and omnichannel management. The company's platform help retailers fulfill orders in minutes by instantly shipping online orders directly from physical retail stores and providing tools & software to help omnichannel retailers operate better, and faster, enabling brick-and-mortar retailers to operate more efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of an operations platform designed for omnichannel retail and omnichannel management. The company's platform help retailers fulfill orders in minutes by instantly shipping online orders directly from physical retail stores and providing tools & software to help omnichannel retailers operate better, and faster, enabling brick-and-mortar retailers to operate more efficiently.

name: Vedra Holdings LLC
description: PRICE LAB optimizes the pricing strategy and communication in physical stores for retailers through a SaaS and hardware solution. It replaces paper prices on shelves with digital price tags that are updated in real time through a cloud platform.
one_liner: PRICE LAB optimizes the pricing strategy and communication in physical stores for retailers through a SaaS and hardware solution. It replaces paper prices on shelves with digital price tags that are updated in real time through a cloud platform.

name: Retailo Group Holding Limited
description: Developer of an online marketplace platform designed to address issues within the informal retail market. The company's platform provides access to a list of suppliers and products to order along with delivery services, enabling retailers, manufacturers, distributors, and wholesalers to save money and improve their working capital requirements and inventory management.
one_liner: Developer of an online marketplace platform designed to address issues within the informal retail market. The company's platform provides access to a list of suppliers and products to order along with delivery services, enabling retailers, manufacturers, distributors, and wholesalers to save money and improve their working capital requirements and inventory management.

name: OneStoreHub Pte Ltd
description: Developer of cloud-based point-of-sale software designed to help retailers to digitize their business. The company's software develops a cloud-based point-of-sale system that offers real-time reports, inventory management, and customer data collection that help to connect the long line of less sophisticated physical traders online, enabling users to digitize their finances and inventory management.
one_liner: Developer of cloud-based point-of-sale software designed to help retailers to digitize their business. The company's software develops a cloud-based point-of-sale system that offers real-time reports, inventory management, and customer data collection that help to connect the long line of less sophisticated physical traders online, enabling users to digitize their finances and inventory management.

name: Tass Vision, Inc.
description: Developer of a video surveillance system designed to detect, track, and analyze camera data. The company's system includes visitor analytics which gives detailed information about visitors, helps in detecting the most visited zones with its pre-installed heat card, and records staff's arrival and departure times, enabling marketing analysts to understand the target audience and track business changes.
one_liner: Developer of a video surveillance system designed to detect, track, and analyze camera data. The company's system includes visitor analytics which gives detailed information about visitors, helps in detecting the most visited zones with its pre-installed heat card, and records staff's arrival and departure times, enabling marketing analysts to understand the target audience and track business changes.

name: MMA Brand Services Pte. Ltd.
description: Provider of strategic branding services intended to accelerate e-commerce growth. The company uses significant growth capital to transform e-commerce brands by buying category-winning brands with a strong track record, high product quality, and great customer reviews, enabling businesses to grow into global, well-loved, and enduring household names.
one_liner: Provider of strategic branding services intended to accelerate e-commerce growth. The company uses significant growth capital to transform e-commerce brands by buying category-winning brands with a strong track record, high product quality, and great customer reviews, enabling businesses to grow into global, well-loved, and enduring household names.

name: Verofax Limited
description: Developer of a blockchain-based intelligent application suite designed to help achieve complete inventory oversight and create immersive experiences. The company's platform is powered by smart serialization and traceability offering connected products and intelligent data analytics, enabling businesses to increase sales and reduce costs by streamlining operations, improving control over operations and automating processes.
one_liner: Developer of a blockchain-based intelligent application suite designed to help achieve complete inventory oversight and create immersive experiences. The company's platform is powered by smart serialization and traceability offering connected products and intelligent data analytics, enabling businesses to increase sales and reduce costs by streamlining operations, improving control over operations and automating processes.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Retail, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality
